faqs.question: Will I get to interact with my tutor?
faqs.answer: Yes! All the doubts and queries would be addressed through built in chat option and WhatsApp portal would also be active where your tutor would respond you within 24 hours of addressing your query.

faqs.question: Who all can attend this course?
faqs.answer: Anyone struggling with weight gain or a non- consistent workout routine can hop onto these sessions.

faqs.question: Do I need any equipment?
faqs.answer: No! These are no equipment workouts for you to practice them easily at home.

faqs.question: What is the procedure after I purchase this course?
faqs.answer: Once you register for our sessions, your course will be visible to you in ‘My stuff’. You can select your desired time slot once each day and can attend your session.

faqs.question: What if I miss a session?
faqs.answer: In case you miss a session, don’t worry. We offer flexible time slots to our users. You can select your desired time slot each day.

title.normal: by making amazing food like Masterchef

header: Whether moving away from the home for the first time or tired of PG/Hostel food

instructor.name: Mr. Prince Sharma
instructor.description: Masterchef India fame, Prince Sharma is a celebrity chef and food industry trainer. He is well known for his chocolate & sugar art where he remains at the top for his creations.Learn all about the basics of baking with Masterchef himself.Relish not just your self baked desserts, but also the tips and tricks behind being a successful baker. Get ready to run your own successful bakery.

btnText: Learn the art of cooking in 60 days for

advantages.text: You will get to learn unique cooking methods,patterns and techniques.
You will master the measurement of dry & fresh ingredients and learn about spices and herbs.
You will become a confident home cook,even if you have never liked cooking.It's easier than you think.
You will learn how to setup your own kitchen,use appliances and many more.

checklist.text: You want to say 'No' to boring food & cook amazing dishes daily that you will be proud of?
You want to go beyond 'chai' & 'maggi' and your culinary journey?
You want to save money and impress you friends with your cooking skills like a master chef?
You don't want to rely on any third person to cook food for you?

testimonialsHeading: 5000+ people people from all over the world have mastered their art of indian cooking with us.

faqs.question: What are other benefits would I get along with this course?
faqs.answer: You will get notes curated by our tutors and premium access to our peer community. You will also get exclusive offers for our upcoming workshops related to the course.

faqs.question: Do I need any ingredients to begin with?
faqs.answer: As it is a practical course, you will require only basic cooking ingredients to practice what tutor teaches.

faqs.question: Who all can attend this course?
faqs.answer: Anyone of the age 12+ interested in the domain can attend the course.You will get to learn everything from a basic or beginner level.

faqs.question: Can we ask our doubts after completion also?
faqs.answer: Of course!We offer lifetime doubt solving access once you register for our course where you can stay connected to your tutor through whatsapp messaging?

faqs.answer: In case you miss a session, don’t worry. We offer flexible time slots to our users. You can select your desired time slot each day.
